about_the_game:
Explore the Void with these additional in-game items:

  • In-Game Item - Unique Rogue Trader Throne
    Change the appearance of the throne on your voidship’s bridge to something even more illustrious and befitting of your status as Rogue Trader.
  • In-Game Item - Cherub Pet
    Allows you to change the appearance of your trusty companion from the regular Servoskull to the Cherub!

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains scenes and texts some people may find disturbing. They are not graphically detailed and presented from an isometric point of view, and most of them occur episodically. However, we consider it our duty to inform our players about them. You may see depictions of blood, gore, dismemberment, torture, slavery, and kidnapping in this game. It also contains textual descriptions and mentions of abuse, child abuse, sexual abuse, sexual assault, self-harm, suicide, cannibalism, and miscarriage. Player discretion is advised.

detailed_description:
Explore the Void with these additional in-game items:

  • In-Game Item - Unique Rogue Trader Throne

    Allows you to change the appearance of your trusty companion from the regular Servoskull to the Cherub!
